title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing fish in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing fish in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Fish is a seafood that many people love. As for seeing fish in a dream, will it be good or are there other nutrients behind this dream? We will learn this in the following lines with clarification so that the viewer does not worry or get his attention distracted between the different interpretations. Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates the many benefits and abundant goodness that the dreamer will obtain in the coming period of his life. Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin For the girl, it shows the positive changes that will occur in her life in the coming days and she will live in comfort and security, away from envy and hatred. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing fish in a dream By Ibn Sirin for a single woman. Ibn Sirin says that seeing fish in a dream for an unmarried woman means the good news that she will learn in the coming days and her life will change for the better. Seeing a fish in a dream for a girl indicates the end of the conflicts and sorrows that blocked her path to success in the past, and a fish in the dreamer’s dream means that she has... A major promotion at work due to her efficiency and dedication to implementation. The duties required of her at the appropriate time, and she will attain a prominent position in society later in her life, and her family will be proud of what she has achieved. Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman. Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman indicates the stability of the marital life in which she lives and her freedom from crises and quarrels. Which happened in the previous days. Seeing the fish in the lady’s vision indicates that she will obtain a large inheritance that was stolen from her in the past by force and her life will change for the better and she will work to meet the demands of her children so that they can live a comfortable and reassured life and educate them with positivity and freedom so that they can rely on themselves and face society. With enthusiasm and strength, and fishing in the dreamer’s sleep, she learns the news of her pregnancy from the treating doctor, and her recovery from the diseases that prevented her from doing so. Seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a fish in a dream for a pregnant woman symbolizes the happy news that her husband will tell her about it in the coming days. Next, eating uncooked fish in a woman’s dream indicates an easy and easy birth for her and the adornment of fish in it. The dream of a sleeping person indicates that he will give birth to a son and help his family in their old age. Seeing a dead fish in the dreamer’s sleep portends a health crisis that she will suffer in the near future due to her neglect of the doctor’s instructions, which may lead to the loss of her child and she will regret it, but it is too late. Seeing fish in a dream for a son Sirin for a divorced woman: Seeing fish in a dream for a divorced woman symbolizes the death of her worries and sorrows that she was experiencing because of her ex-husband and his despicable attempt to ruin and ruin her life, but her Lord will compensate her with a lot of goodness and giving. Gains

title: Interpretation of a dream about the moon near the Earth

preview.html: And seeing the moon near the earth and the dreamer holding it in his hand, this indicates an important and good work that the dreamer will accept. Interpretation of seeing the moon near the earth in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that the moon is very close to the earth. And she can touch it in a dream while feeling very happy in the dream. Here the meaning indicates that this single dreaming girl will witness the fulfillment of many wishes and dreams for her in life during this period. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that the moon is small in size. It was close to the earth, but she could not touch it in a dream. This indicates that this dreaming girl will enjoy good luck in her life. She will get many things full of goodness and food, God willing. If an unmarried girl dreams that she was trying to get close to the moon in a dream, and it is very close to the earth. Here the meaning appears that this single girl is trying hard to reach all her dreams. And her goals and successes in life, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. See also: Interpretation of seeing the crescent moon in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing the moon near the earth in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream She was looking at the moon and it was close to the earth in the dream, and she was very happy to look at it. This indicates the great happiness that will happen to this married woman. It will save her from all the problems and worries that she lives with, God willing. Seeing a married woman in a dream trying to find the moon near the earth, but she cannot reach it in the dream. Here the meaning refers to some dreams and goals that this dreaming married woman could not achieve in her life during this time. Seeing that a married woman was touching the moon near the earth in a dream and she feels happy. This indicates that she will see good luck in all the matters she participates in during this time, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the moon near the earth in a dream for a divorced woman If the divorced woman sees in her dream that she is looking at the moon and it is close to the earth but she did not touch it in the dream. This indicates that she will get rid of all the problems and great fears that will happen to her and she will suffer from them during this period. Likewise, seeing the divorced woman in a dream sees many moons near the earth, and their appearance is very beautiful in the dream. Here the meaning indicates that this divorced woman will achieve many goals. And she dreams in her life without fatigue or misery God willing. And the divorced woman who saw in a dream that she was looking for the moon near the earth in the dream but did not find it. This indicates that this divorced woman will face some crises and problems in her life during this time, but God Almighty helps her get rid of them. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the sun in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing the moon near the earth in a dream about a person and its meaning If a person sees in a dream that he was looking for the moon and that it is very close to the earth, but he could not see it. This indicates the abundance of goodness and great blessings that this dreamer lives in his life. But he did not look at them and did not

title: Interpretation of seeing a window or window in a dream

preview.html: I LikeFansSubscribedFans The interpretation of a dream about a window or a window in a dream foretells that the dreamer will become good and achieve what he wants in this world of work or marriage. Open a window, its symbol is good, especially if it has a beautiful view, and a closed window is a disappointment as well as a broken window. In general, the window means renewed hope and desire for life, and the beginning of success between you. Your family and work For more information about the dream window, we provide these instructions as follows. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a window for a single woman One window This means her marriage to a young man she loves. If the window is open, it means renewal of good hope for the girl. Interpretation of a dream about someone looking out the window and the girl knows him and tells him About Bashar about her marriage to him. If the girl is looking out the window and talking to a stranger, this is good news about an upcoming marriage. Interpretation of a dream about closing the window and if she is engaged, this means that the engagement will be cancelled. If the girl is not engaged, then seeing the open window means marriage or searching About work. Looking out the window and seeing many good things, they are already earning a living. A dream in which you see a window for a married woman. She heard good news from those close to her and perhaps from her family. An open window for a married woman means the arrival of long-awaited news. If the married woman has had children for a while Long, the net shows weakness and pregnancy. Closing a window means that her husband is leaving her or going on a trip. A dream about a window for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a falling window for a pregnant woman means that labor pains are minor, and her birth is easy. Seeing an open window means that the child is free from diseases. If she looks A pregnant woman looks from the window and sees a child with beautiful features, she is truly blessed with him as she saw him. Interpretation of a dream about a window for a man. Interpretation of opening a window in a dream means that this person fulfills his dreams. If he sees himself looking out the window, it means success in his career. If the view from the window is Bad, it has no meaning and he may hear some unpleasant news that brings sadness to his heart. If this man sees the sea from the window, this is a sign that he is going to a place where the sea is already there. Interpretation of a dream about a broken windowInterpretation of seeing a broken window or removing it from its place means failure In the things you intend to do, commentators considered that seeing an ugly scene means loss and failure in life. Be very careful because these disagreements may lead to divorce. A broken window for a married or unmarried young man means failure. A married man may lose his job or find major obstacles among his colleagues or managers at work. Also, if an unmarried woman is in a relationship with a young man and this relationship is innocent and she wants to get married, then the broken window means that this young man is not doing well in it. If you have a dream and want to know the interpretation, you can send the dream to the Shamloul website team by commenting below the article where it will be interpreted. Dream and respond to it in a short time. My time.

title: The top 10 interpretations of seeing blood in a dream come from another person

preview.html: Seeing blood in a dream comes from another person. There is no doubt that seeing blood is frightening and makes us feel very afraid and insecure. A problem or does the vision belong to the dreamer? This is what we will learn, whether for unmarried, married, or pregnant women, until we learn in detail the meaning of the vision throughout the article. Seeing blood in a dream comes from another person. If the dream revolves around a person known to the dreamer, this means that this person will be exposed to an experience and an insurmountable problem. Easily and the dreamer needs to help him and save him from his problems by exchanging advice. And urging him to do good. The vision can also lead the dreamer to expose himself to a problem and also needs someone to help him get out of it before he participates in greater trials that he will not be able to overcome later. Some interpreters believe that this person has sins in his life and the dreamer should To urge him to approach his Lord and repent as soon as possible so that he can get out of any danger in his life and not go through sadness or anxiety. And until his Lord is satisfied with him and protects him from all harm. Seeing blood in a dream coming out of another person according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the dream expresses the need to help this person, as there is a major crisis that everyone is going through, so the dreamer must work with him to escape from this dangerous pressure that It hurts him a lot. So that he can live in psychological stability and calm. The dream indicates that he made a mistake by increasing his sins and making him a sinner, so he must repent and ask forgiveness from God Almighty to forgive him and repent for him. The vision can lead to the emergence of some secrets and secrets that the dreamer does not wish to reveal at the present time, But he faces a problem as a result of this matter, which makes it necessary to try to solve this problem without developing it. The vision also shows the imminent return of an absent person near the dreamer, who wants to see him and always thinks about him, so he sees him in his dream and makes sure he arrives as quickly as possible. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, Search on Google, the online dream interpretation site. Seeing blood in a dream coming from another person is for one person - whose blood was bleeding from her lover, and this expresses the strength of his love for her and his desire to reach a distinguished position in his work so that he can communicate with her as quickly as possible. And if she The bleeding woman is the sister, so this leads the dreamer or her sister to some fatigue, so she prays to God Almighty for a speedy recovery so she can live her life without pain, either that pain. It belongs to her or her sister. But if the person who shed the blood is her friend, then she must be careful to divulge some secrets, so that she does not feel afraid, but rather try to calm down and not be nervous so that she is not harmed psychologically. He must choose good friendships in the coming period. If the girl’s hand is filled with blood, this leads to anxiety and pain that the dreamer is experiencing at this time, which saddens him until he gets rid of this anxiety permanently with prayer and patience. Seeing blood in a dream comes from another person to a married woman, and the vision is good news. The end of anxiety and crises in the dreamer’s life. If she had problems with her husband that harmed her soul, this expresses her freedom from this.

title: Interpretation of dreams for the days of the week (Saturday, Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday)

preview.html: Interpretation of the word after a week in a dreamInterpretation of dreams on Thursday by Ibn SirinInterpretation of the number of days in a dreamInterpretation of Saturday in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of engagement on ThursdayInterpretation of a dream of an appointment in a weekAppointment after a week in a dreamThe meaning of Saturday in a dreamA dream counting the days: Whoever sees that he is counting the days indicates that he will be held accountable, and it has been said that counting the days is interpreted in five aspects: job, salary, accounting, kindness, blessing, and travel. Saturday dream: Whoever sees Saturday and believes that it is Friday is busy with work and believes that it is good and this is another matter. A dream that changed one day: It is said: Whoever sees a day changing and is surprised by it indicates a change in his condition, and the best vision of days is Friday, then Monday and Thursday. Friday dream: As for Friday, it is interpreted by years or months as stated in the meaning of the hadith. And who saw Sunday? I believe that Friday is related to Christians, and it was said that seeing Friday is good and blessed, and seeing Saturday depends on a subject, and seeing Sunday is the beginning of a matter, and seeing Monday is striving for something and accomplishing it, and seeing Tuesday is a rest from fatigue, and seeing Wednesday is stability and continuity, and it was said anger and self-control, and seeing Thursday is good And Mubarak, the dream said. On Tuesday, if he thinks that it is Friday, he accompanies the people of corruption, and if he sees Wednesday like this, he loves the people of heresy. Interpretation of a dream about seeing days: Or not, seeing days in general shows the good and evil that awaits the dreamer in the coming period, and Friday in a dream is considered one of the best and most auspicious days of the week. Secondly, whoever sees in his dream that all his days are good and happy, this is a sign of the joy that will overwhelm him in the coming period. As for whoever sees in his dream that the days he lives are full of sadness and sorrow, this is an indication of the sadness that he will feel in the near future. Thirdly, whoever sees in his dream that it is Friday, this is evidence of the abundance of blessings that he enjoys. Fourthly, as for seeing Sunday in a dream, it shows the changes and changes that will occur in the dreamer's life and will be a new beginning. Fifthly, whoever dreams in a dream on Saturday, this indicates positive changes in the side and refraining from one of the bad habits that the dreamer does in his real life. *Sixth, Monday in a dream shows the great efforts that the dreamer will make to achieve his dreams and hopes. Seventh, Tuesday in a dream indicates the comfort and tranquility that the dreamer will enjoy in the coming period of his life. Eighth, Wednesday in the dreamer is stability and stability in the dreamer's life that he has longed for for a long time, whether on the practical, family or social level. Ninth, and whoever dreams on Thursday, this is a sign of the blessings and goodness that will come to him and his family in the coming days. Days of the week Waseem Youssef YouTube

A dream about Saturday: Whoever sees Saturday and thinks it is Friday is busy with work and thinks it is good, but this is another matter. A dream that changed one day: It is said: Whoever sees a day changes He is surprised by it, which indicates a change in his condition, and the best days to see are Friday, then Monday, and Thursday. Dream of Friday: As for Friday, it is interpreted in terms of years or months, as stated in the meaning of the hadith. Who has seen Sunday? I believe that Friday is linked to Christians, and it was said that seeing Friday Good and blessed. Seeing Saturday depends on a topic. Seeing Sunday is the beginning of something. Seeing Monday is striving for something and achieving it. Seeing Tuesday is rest from fatigue. Seeing Wednesday is stability and continuity. Anger and self-control were said. Seeing Thursday is good and blessed. The dream said. On Tuesday, if he thinks it is Friday, then he accompanies the people of corruption, and if he sees Wednesday like this, he likes the people of heresy. Interpretation of a dream about seeing days: or not, seeing days in general shows the good and evil that awaits the dreamer in the coming period, and Friday in a dream is considered one of the best. The most auspicious days of the week. Secondly, whoever sees in his dream that all his days are good and happy, this is a sign of the joy that will overwhelm him in the coming period. As for whoever sees in his dream that the days he lives are full of sadness and sadness, this is an indication of the sadness that he will feel in the near future. Third, and whoever sees in his dream that it is Friday, this is evidence of the abundance of blessings that he enjoys. Fourth, as for seeing Sunday in a dream, it shows changes. The changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life will be a new beginning. Fifth: Whoever dreams in a dream on Saturday, this indicates positive changes on the side and refraining from one of the bad habits that the dreamer does in his real life. *Sixth, Monday in a dream shows the great efforts that the dreamer will make to achieve his dreams and hopes. Seventh, Tuesday in a dream indicates comfort and calm that the dreamer will enjoy in the coming period of his life. Eighth, Wednesday in the dream is stability and stability in the dreamer’s life that he has longed for for a long time. Whether on the practical, family or social level. Ninth: Whoever dreams on Thursday, this is a sign of the blessings and goodness that will come to him and his family in the coming days. Days of the week Waseem Youssef YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream when you see reading or hearing Surat Al-Infitar in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Seeing reading or listening to Surat Al-Inftar in a dream, and seeing Surat Al-Inftar in a dream indicates many blessings and enjoying good health and may also indicate abuse from those close to you or indicate delay in prayer. Good for the dreamer, and it could be a warning to him, and this makes the dreamer very curious, and he continues to search for the interpretation of this vision, its interpretation and meaning, and wonders if this dream indicates good or evil, and this is what we will learn through this article. Interpretation of Surat Al-Infitar in a dream According to Ibn Sirin, according to Ibn Shirin, if one sees in a dream that he is reciting Surat Al-Infitar, this means that this person has a lot of evil people around him and they have bad morals and they talk about him behind his back. But if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is reading Surat Al-Inftar, it means that this girl will have a very good livelihood. And abundant money. An unmarried girl who reads Surat Al-Iftar in a dream is a warning to this girl because she is far from God and does not perform prayers on time. And that she will enter into a project or want to achieve goals and ambitions, and after this dream she will be able to achieve them. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is reading Surat Al-Infitar, this means that this woman will soon be announced by God with pregnancy and good offspring and she will live with her husband in a happy and stable life. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is reciting Surat Al-Anftar, this means that this woman will give birth and that she and her fetus are safe and sound. title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother waking me up in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of my mother who wakes me up in a dream, you, dear reader, can find out the interpretation of dreams of my mother who advises me in a dream and what it brings, according to what scholars and translators put forward without personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about my mother waking me up from sleep in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my mother waking me up from sleep in a dream. Waking up from sleep can express the awakening of neglect, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees himself waking up in a dream, he may be able to control his neglect, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees herself waking up in a dream, this may represent the good luck she is enjoying, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself waking up, it may lead to better circumstances, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my mother asking for a divorce from my father in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother Asking for a divorce from my father in a dream could lead to getting rid of problems, and God knows best. Just as a married woman sees a mother asking for a divorce, this may indicate the satisfaction of desires, and God knows the unseen. If a single young man sees a mother asking his father for a divorce in a dream, this may be evidence that he It will relieve stress, God willing. When a married man sees his mother asking his father for a divorce in a dream, this may represent her ability to achieve goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my mother asking me to marry in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother asking me to get married in a dream that may express good news, and God is Most High. And know that if an unmarried girl sees a marriage proposal from her in a dream, this may indicate a young man who wants to marry her, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees a marriage proposal and refuses in a dream, this may indicate bad news, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Therefore, seeing a marriage proposal in a dream It may represent someone who loves her but cannot tell her, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother asking me for water in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother asking me for water in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing someone asking for water and giving it to her may indicate his good character, and God knows best, where if she sees If a married woman asks for water in a dream, this may be evidence that he is among the righteous, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl is seen asking for water in a dream, this may indicate the need for help and support, and God knows everything that no one has seen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother asking for water. Money from me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother asking me for money in a dream could represent kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a mother asking her son in a dream may indicate that a good son is with his mother, and God knows best. If a married woman sees her mother asking for money in a dream, she can To express her justice to her mother, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees her mother asking her for money in a dream, this may express justice and support for the mother, and God knows all the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother asking me for help in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother asking me for help in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for this vision, however

title: Interpretation of the stadium in a dream: Seeing the match in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a stadiumInterpretation of a dream about watching a football matchInterpretation of a dream about playing football for individualsInterpretation of a dream about playing football according to Ibn SirinThe green color in a single woman’s dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing a ball according to Ibn Sirin: It is said that the ball is the human heartThe ball in a dream indicates quarrels and a world that some reject and others seek, and perhaps it indicates that he is traveling He moves from one place to another, and he is a man. Playing with the ball is controversial, because whoever plays with it hits the ground with it whenever he picks it up. Whoever sees that he is hitting the ball while he is a king, then he will triumph over his enemies. If he sees that he is hitting the ball while he is one of the common people, then he will quarrel with someone, and the majority will be victorious. ; Because whoever plays with it, whenever he hits it, it hits the ground, and he can quarrel with others and listen. Bad words. It was said that if the ball was from the end, it would be interpreted by a president or a scholar. Ibn Sirin Sheikh Abdul Rahman Roya plays football - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about electrical appliances

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about electrical appliances In different situations, electrical appliances are necessary things in our lives. Without an electric washing machine, a woman will face many problems in getting clean clothes, and without a refrigerator, food will spoil, and without an electric stove, food will not be cooked. It is known that these electrical appliances have helped a lot in saving time and effort to do things. To see electrical appliances in a dream, there are many interpretations. And the interpretations that we will tell you today in this article on the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a dream about electrical appliances in a dream: There are many different electrical appliances, there is a refrigerator, a washing machine, a stove, a blender, an iron, and many other electrical appliances that the dreamer can find in a dream, and here are the interpretations: Interpretation of a dream Seeing a gas stove in a dream: Scientists and interpreters interpret seeing butane in a dream as one of the happy dreams, as butane in the dream is considered an indication of the arrival of money and livelihood after effort. If the dreamer finds in his dream that the stove is in a good and decent appearance, then this is a sign of goodness and hope. Which will go up inside him. If he sees black smoke coming from the stove, he will be exposed to bad news. If an unmarried woman finds herself lighting the stove and cooking, seeing her is a sign of kindness. From the loss of hope and its negative energy. As for the married woman who sees the gasaki in good condition, it is good news for her that she will enjoy stability and peace in her married life, and she will enter a new happy stage in her life, God willing. It may be work or childbearing, but the burning gas or that has defects or not Working does not indicate good and indicates that there are some problems that he will suffer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a washing machine in a dream: Seeing a washing machine in a dream means that God will bless him with an obedient wife who meets the requirements of her home. It may be good news for the wife who gives him an example of sacrifice and giving. That he will make peace with one of his competitors in reality. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is washing clothes in a washing machine, this is an indication of the preparations that she will make for her marriage, which will take place soon, God willing. And for a married woman who sees a washing machine in her dream is a huge amount of money that will come into her hands soon, God willing. God, and if she finds herself washing clothes in a dream, this is good news for her that she will become pregnant soon. When a pregnant woman sees a washing machine in a dream, this is evidence that the time of childbirth is approaching, and her dream is an indication that she will enjoy an easy and simple birth, God willing, without problems. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a refrigerator in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is opening his refrigerator, this is evidence that he will obtain food and good things. Wide, as if he was a merchant who made money and God enriched him with his courage and white hair. The refrigerator in a dream is a sign of a good, loyal wife and husband, and an empty food refrigerator is a bad omen that shows joy, and the dreamer is described as ascetic, but does not indicate poverty. Or loss. If an unmarried woman finds a refrigerator full of good things and food, she...

title: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant widow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a widow pregnant in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com as seeing a widow’s pregnancy in a dream as one of the promising visions that indicates goodness, livelihood, and happiness for the dreamer, so we will talk about the interpretation This article, based on our topic, is about a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, a young woman and a divorced woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a single girl? An unmarried girl seeing a pregnant widow in a dream is an indication that she is waiting for important things to happen to her, Such as marriage or a new job. Seeing an unmarried woman about a pregnant woman in a dream. Intense crying is a sign of approaching labor and loss of anxiety and sadness. Seeing a happy pregnant woman in a dream for a single woman is an indication of the presence of many differences, problems, and the loss of many things in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing that I am Pregnant in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a pregnant woman in a dream? A barren married woman seeing a pregnant woman in a dream announces her intense desire to become pregnant and have many children. Seeing a married woman giving birth to a pregnant woman in a dream indicates living with an imminent pregnancy, and a lot of pressures and responsibilities on her. A vision. In a dream, a pregnant woman’s partners and her entering her home suggests that she will bring the dreamer pleasant surprises and real joy. Seeing an ugly pregnant woman in a dream indicates dealing with major problems and difficulties at work that may lead to leaving the job. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream What is the interpretation of the man who sees A pregnant woman in a dream? A man sees a pregnant woman in a dream. The strange thing is that it indicates that she is thinking carefully about many things that could completely change his life. A man seeing a supernatural woman in a dream indicates that she has achieved what she desires and dreams of after a long journey of struggle, and a woman appears An ugly woman feels anguish and psychological fatigue. Seeing a man carrying his barren wife in a dream is one of the promising visions that show that they will have many children and hear good news. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing a pregnant woman in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman about a pregnant woman in a dream is among the strange visions that indicate On the ease of childbirth in the case of a very beautiful woman, and in the case of a sad woman who cries a lot, this indicates exhaustion and severe pain during pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth in a dream indicates an imminent gulf and the loss of sadness and pain from her life. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream indicates the opening of doors. Sustenance and many good things for the vision. See also: Interpretation of giving birth to a non-pregnant woman in a dream. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman seeing a pregnant woman in a dream? A divorced woman sees a pregnant woman in a dream. It indicates her good condition, bringing goodness to her, and the end of her troubles and sadness in the event that she is pregnant with a girl, and in the event that she is pregnant with a boy, it appears. She has a feeling of psychological fatigue and longevity. - Suffering for long periods or acquiring enormous wealth. See also: Interpretation of Ejha’s vision
